title: Getting started with Keycloak powered by Quarkus
content: This article covers the updates in Keycloak which now runs on top of Quarkus. The former (WildFly) distribution of Keycloak is deprecated so you should promptly start the migration process. Keycloak overview Keycloak is an Identity Provider that enables you to secure your Web applications by providing Single Sign-On (SSO) capabilities and leveraging industry standards ...  The post appeared first on .
